TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplateContent extends System.Object

summary.span: 實作錄製和播放邏輯，範本會在與 XAML 讀取器和寫入器互動時，使用這個邏輯來延後內容。

span.span: Implements the record and playback logic that templates use for deferring content when they interact with XAML readers and writers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會有任何公用 API 在.NET Framework 4.5 Beta。This class has no public API in .NET Framework 4.5 Beta. 它提供的屬性值。It provides a property value for . 其建構函式是內部方法。Its constructor is internal. 具現化路徑，但很複雜。There is an instantiation pathway, but it is complex. 具現化範本依賴，這項工作需要代表延後的讀取器執行個體，和服務。Instantiating a template relies on , which requires a representing a deferred reader instance, and a service. 這兩個可這些考量通常僅適用於那些不使用預設 XAML WPF 處理行為，其中包含延後內容處理的範本做為它的基礎結構的一部分，並不需要一般的 WPF 應用程式作者來存取上述應用程式開發介面。Both these considerations are typically only relevant to those that are not using the default XAML for WPF processing behavior, which includes deferred content processing of templates as part of its infrastructure, and does not require the typical WPF application author to access the aforementioned APIs.
